author: Sarah Jones
title: Did My Fundamentalist Upbringing Prepare Me For Coronavirus?
description: I was raised to believe the End was near. Then came the coronavirus.
content: About a year after 9/11, I asked my mother if Jesus would come back before I grew up. She replied, ominously, that He probably would. For years wed monitored the news, listened for the sound of a trumpet that would split the sky so the Lord would appear and t… [+6297 chars]
